alert.note: Alert for Kandiyohi (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 29 at 3:22AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN KANDIYOHI COUNTY THROUGH 400 AM CDT... At 322 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Spicer, or 9 miles northeast of Willmar, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Willmar, New London, Spicer, Green Lake, Kandiyohi, Regal, Hawick, and Sibley State Park. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 12 between mile markers 77 and 86. U.S. Highway 8 in Minnesota near mile marker 6. U.S. Highway 71 between mile markers 125 and 144. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
